text: Vecuronium is a medicine that relaxes muscles during surgery, or when a person needs a machine to help them breathe. It belongs to a group of drugs called skeletal muscle relaxants. It is often used as part of general anesthesia. It makes it easier to put a tube down a person's throat to help them breathe. (This is called intubation.) ==References== Category:Drugs
title: Vecuronium
